title: Assassins.Creed.Unity-RELOADED
description:
Year: November 11, 2014
Genre: Action, Stealth, 3D, 3rd, Person
Developer: Ubisoft Montreal
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Publication Type: License
Game Version: v1.2.0
Language: English, Russian MULTI14
Language: English, Russian MULTI7
Tablet: Is present [LUMAemu / Steam006]


::Description::


The new game will unfold in Paris in the 18th century. Developers presented 
gamers new assassin Austrian-French origin named Arno Dorian. The game also 
will be co-op multiplayer for 4 people.


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8/8.1 (64-bit operating system required) 
Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz 
Memory: 6 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (2 GB VRAM) 
Hard Drive: 50 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers 
Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, optional controller.


::Gold Edition Features::


Additional unlockable content
Set "Royal Arsenal" including:
- Dueling shirt Athos
- Black pants musketeer
- Rapier "Pappenhaymer"
Additional package "Brotherhood" includes:
- Axe "splitter armor" and a battle ax
- Pants National Guard
- Kara spear
- Quest "Victim of Science"
Season pass
More than 5 hours of playing time in the campaign: help Arno restore order 
in the commune of Saint-Denis.
Assassin's Creed Chronicles China additional jobs in China of the XVI century.
Additional materials for Assassin's Creed Unity
- Unique Weapon: "Blade Lilies"
- 3 extra. jobs, 20 weapons and 10 costumes


::Update for 1.2 version::


Ubisoft Entertainment
Assassin's Creed Unity v1.2.0
################################################################
Fixed crash when accepting invitation in specific cases
Added NVIDIA technologies descriptions in advanced graphics page
Improved performance in cinematic on low HW configurations
Fixed various Graphic issues
Fixed various Input issues
Fixed various Multi-GPU issues
Fixed various UI issues
Fixed various Uplay Invitations issues 


How To Install 

- Burn or mount the image.
- Install the game.
- Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to your game install directory.
- Copy the /Crack/rld-acu-lang.exe to the game install directory if you want to use the language selector to select between English, French, Spanish, Polish, German, Chinese, Hungarian, Italian or Japanese.
- Play
